title: Recurring out of memory kills
body:
#### System information

2 x Xeon Gold 6142, 256GB RAM, 12.8TB NVMe

Erigon version: erigon version 2.49.0-stable

OS & Version: Debian 12 Linux, 6.1.0-10-amd64 kernel

Commit hash: 

Erigon Command (with flags/config):

/usr/local/bin/erigon \
  --chain=mainnet \
  --datadir=/var/lib/erigon \
  --authrpc.jwtsecret=/var/lib/jwtsecret/jwt.hex \
  --authrpc.port=8551 \
  --http.port=8545 \
  --http.addr=0.0.0.0 \
  --http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool \
  --ws \
  --txpool.api.addr=0.0.0.0:9090 \
  --private.api.addr=0.0.0.0:9090 \
  --prune.r.before=11052984 \
  --prune htc

Concensus Layer: Teku

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config):

/opt/teku/bin/teku \
  --network=mainnet \
  --data-path=/storage/teku \
  --rest-api-enabled=true \
  --rest-api-host-allowlist=* \
  --rest-api-interface=0.0.0.0 \
  --rest-api-port=5051 \
  --p2p-port=9000 \
  --ee-endpoint=http://127.0.0.1:8551 \
  --ee-jwt-secret-file=/var/lib/jwtsecret/jwt.hex \
  --metrics-enabled=true \
  --metrics-host-allowlist=* \
  --metrics-interface=0.0.0.0 \
  --p2p-peer-lower-bound=256 \
  --p2p-peer-upper-bound=512 \
  --beacon-liveness-tracking-enabled=true \
  --reconstruct-historic-states=true \
  --data-storage-archive-frequency=64 \
  --data-storage-mode=archive \
  --builder-endpoint=http://127.0.0.1:18550

Chain/Network: Mainnet Ethereum

#### Expected behaviour

Sync to the height.

#### Actual behaviour

Eats all the memory and crashes every 2-3 days.

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Start sync with a clean datadir and wait.

#### Backtrace
